title: BIG FACTS feat. BIG LEX + JUUGMAN
itunes:title: BIG FACTS feat. BIG LEX + JUUGMAN
description:
Rising reality star BIG LEX joins BIG FACTS to discuss controversy, hustling and relationships.

Legendary underground ATL rapper JUUGMAN has a conversation with BIG FACTS about his career, ups and downs and his plans moving forward in the future.
